name: Bitmai
description:
Full Action game in a simple mechanic

Bitmai is a fast paced action game for Windows.

Spawning in a great colorful world, your goal is to kill as many Dorfs (enemies) using your boomerang. You will find random powerups around the map that can increase your speed or your boomerang's speed, or destroy all enemies around the map.

WASD for movement and Right Click to throw boomerang.

I developed this game using Love2D.

It is available for x32 and x64 Windows Systems.

Any feedback is appreciated!

Have fun!
